description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共甘肃省直属机关工作委员会书记、中共甘肃省委政法委副书记、甘肃省人大常委会副主任及中共武威地委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Secretary of the Working Committee of Organs Directly Under the Gansu Provincial Committee of the CPC, Deputy Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Gansu Provincial Committee of the CPC, Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress, and Secretary of the Wuwei Prefectural Committee of the CPC.
